about_the_game:
The healing power of animals is truly amazing, the dopamine rush of a purring cat, a dog's wagging tail, the softness of a bunnies ears! After getting home from a grueling day of school and a part-time job ready to pet your stress away~ However! Your world was shattered when you returned home and your precious pet rabbit, Miyu, is nowhere to be found and maybe even more alarming is there is a busty naked girl in your apartment!

She immediately greets you with a cheerful "Welcome home, Master!" She hugs you tightly, pressing all her softness against you saying how much she missed you. Is this a dream? A prank? Maybe her... 'client' gave her the wrong information but before you spiral deeper into panic she asserts that the bunny girl currently in your lap is actually your pet rabbit Miyu! She recalls the harrowing backstory of being a poor little bunny shivering in the cold and you rescuing her leaving no doubt in your mind that her story is true and somehow this walking, talking, bunny babe is in fact your pet rabbit transformed!

Miyu says she transformed after praying to the god of bunnies for a way to pay you back for how kind you've been, playing with and petting her everyday but there is one small catch, if you don't impregnate her soon she will turn back into a rabbit! So.. what are you waiting for? Time to lock in and get to work.

  • Translated version of the original Japanese Visual Novel
  • Miyu is fully voiced with original Japanese dialogue
  • Original artwork HD upscaled with 16:9 and 4:3 variants
  • Hours of story content
  • Audio including music and special effects
  • Enhanced with animated character sprites
  • Gallery and Scene selections
  • Enjoy the plethora of *carrot* references during H-Scenes!

Bunny Girl Cumming for my Carrot is the English localization of a Visual Novel originally created by prolific Japanese developer Norn. We at Cherry Kiss aim to provide an authentic Japanese Visual Novel experience to gamers outside of Japan.

**PLEASE NOTE**
All characters described and visually represented in this game are over 18 years of age, and no actual, nor identifiable minor was used in the production of this game.

highlighted.name: What do you mean Miyu's old clothes wont fit anymore?!
The best way to start a morning!
Working hard for the Bunny Family

content_descriptors.notes:
- Large portions of the game include nudity and graphic descriptions of sexual activities.
- There are scenes of sexual intercourse involving pregnant characters.

After getting home from a grueling day of school and a part-time job ready to pet your stress away~ However! 'client' gave her the wrong information but before you spiral deeper into panic she asserts that the bunny girl currently in your lap is actually your pet rabbit Miyu! She recalls the harrowing backstory of being a poor little bunny shivering in the cold and you rescuing her leaving no doubt in your mind that her story is true and somehow this walking, talking, bunny babe is in fact your pet rabbit transformed!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound

short_description: Nothing better than coming home after a long day to your soothing pet rabbit Miyu, WHAT?! Miyu's now a smokin' hot BUNNY GIRL in need of some HEAVY PETTING to be satisfied?!
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
